mapper.select: SELECT p.id, p.title, p.content, p.type, p.timing, p.create_time, u.username AS operator, group_concat(lu.nick_name Separator ',') AS push_users, p.cron, p.rule_describe FROM t_push_information p LEFT JOIN sys_user u ON p.operator = u.user_id LEFT JOIN t_push_user pu ON pu.push_id = p.id LEFT JOIN t_user lu ON pu.user_id = lu.id WHERE timing = #{timing} AND p.deleted = 0 GROUP BY p.id ORDER BY p.create_time DESC LIMIT #{offset}, #{limit}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_push_information ( title, content, type, timing, operator, cron, rule_describe ) VALUES ( #{title}, #{content}, #{type}, #{timing}, #{operatorId}, #{cron}, #{ruleDescribe} )
mapper.select: SELECT count(*) FROM t_push_information WHERE timing = #{timing}

(#{pushId}, #{item})
SELECT user_id FROM t_push_user WHERE push_id = #{pushId}
